survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Scooter Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify response collection.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections if applicable to capture diverse motivations.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to identify safety issues.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
